name: Blowing Bubble HD
description:
Bubble boy and balloon boy is funny children, living in a tiny pink beautiful city. The 2 boys discovers the bubble, balloon and ball world. Suddenly, birds come to play with them. Their story begin.

View the full story : Blowing Bubble HD - The long childhood story

The world is round, everyone has childhood stories, back and explore the bubble, ball and balloon world, your childhood and continue their dreaming adventure.

Blow the balloon, throw the balls to get coins. Match the balls to get scores through 12 colourful levels. Be careful with the naughty bird when it returns.

Blowing Bubble HD game features :

* HD game art design.
* The endless game ever.
* Easy, simple and fun to play, challenging to master.
* +12 colourful levels.
* Various bird speed.
* A lot of blowing and scaling power.
* Completely unlock levels.
* Unique game play.
